tool_description: A tool for retrieving electric vehicle data.

api_list.name: ev
api_list.description: Fetches data related to electric vehicles. Use the 'page' parameter to paginate the results, with a maximum of 1000 objects per page. For example, to access the second page, append *?page=2* to the URL.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the page number for pagination.
